text: gRuhNIqyAt praqjAM paqSUna#syaq nirda#hEdatirAqtrE paqSukA#masya gRuhNIyAqd-vajrOq vai ShO#DaqSI vajrE#NaiqvAsmai# paqSUna#vaqruddhyaq rAtri#-yOqpari#ShTA-cCamayaqtyapya#gniShTOqmE rA#jaqnya#sya gRuhNIyAd-vyAqvRutkA#mOq hi rA#jaqnyO# yaja#tE sAqhna EqvAsmaiq vajra#M gRuhNAtiq sa E#naqM ~MvajrOq BUtyA# indhEq nirvA# daha-tyEkaviq(gm)qSa(gg) stOqtraM Ba#vatiq prati#ShThityaiq hari#vacCasyataq indra#sya priqyaM dhAmO- [  ] 41
